com.tikal.jenkins.plugins.multijob.Multi.description: WARNING: Autogenerated job definition, do not edit. See https://github.com/openshift/aos-cd-jobs/tree/master/sjb">openshift/aos-cd-jobs. Builds the wildfly image from the openshift-s2i/s2i-wildfly repository. References sti-wildfly as the repo because oct does not support non-openshift repository orgs. openshift/sti-wildfly redirects to openshift-s2i/s2i-wildfly.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STI_WILDFLY_TARGET_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The branch in the sti-wildfly repository to test against.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The ID that prow sets on a Jenkins job in order to correlate it with a ProwJob.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REPO_OWNER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: GitHub org that triggered the job.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REPO_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: GitHub repo that triggered the job.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STI_WILDFLY_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull-request in the sti-wildfly repository to test.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PULL_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull-request in the sti-wildfly repository to test. This is compatible with prow.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PULL_REFS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull-request(s) in the sti-wildfly repository to test. This is compatible with prow and can be used for batch testing.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: buildId
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The ID that prow sets on a Jenkins job in order to correlate it with a ProwJob and bubble statuses up to the correct pull request.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PROW_JOB_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The ID that prow sets on a Jenkins job in order to correlate it with a ProwJob.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MERGE_SEVERITY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: How important this pull request is.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: INSTALL THE ORIGIN-CI-TOOL ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: INSTALL THE ORIGIN-CI-TOOL [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi latest="$( readlink "${HOME}/origin-ci-tool/latest" )" touch "${latest}" cp "${latest}/bin/activate" "${WORKSPACE}/activate" cat >> "${WORKSPACE}/activate" <<EOF export OCT_CONFIG_HOME="${WORKSPACE}/.config" EOF
source "${WORKSPACE}/activate" mkdir -p "${OCT_CONFIG_HOME}" rm -rf "${OCT_CONFIG_HOME}/origin-ci-tool" oct configure ansible-client verbosity 2 oct configure aws-client 'keypair_name' 'libra' oct configure aws-client 'private_key_path' '/var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/devenv.pem'

hudson.plugins.descriptionsetter.Descrip.description: Using PR ${STI_WILDFLY_PULL_ID} merged into the sti-wildfly ${STI_WILDFLY_TARGET_BRANCH} branch.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: FORWARD PARAMETERS TO THE REMOTE HOST ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: FORWARD PARAMETERS TO THE REMOTE HOST [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo chmod o+rw /etc/environment ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'STI_WILDFLY_TARGET_BRANCH=${STI_WILDFLY_TARGET_BRANCH:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'PULL_REFS=${PULL_REFS:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'buildId=${buildId:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'BUILD_ID=${BUILD_ID:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'PROW_JOB_ID=${PROW_JOB_ID:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'REPO_OWNER=${REPO_OWNER:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'REPO_NAME=${REPO_NAME:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'STI_WILDFLY_PULL_ID=${STI_WILDFLY_PULL_ID:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'PULL_NUMBER=${PULL_NUMBER:-}' >> /etc/environment"

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: BUILD AND INSTALL S2I ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: BUILD AND INSTALL S2I [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/source-to-image" make build sudo cp /data/src/github.com/openshift/source-to-image/_output/local/bin/linux/amd64/s2i /usr/bin SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 300 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: BUILD THE WILDFLY IMAGES ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: BUILD THE WILDFLY IMAGES [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/sti-wildfly" make build TARGET=centos7 SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 10800 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: TEST THE WILDFLY IMAGES ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: TEST THE WILDFLY IMAGES [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/sti-wildfly" make test TARGET=centos7 TAG_ON_SUCCESS=true SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 7200 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: CREATE DIRECTORY FOR DOCKER CONFIG ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: CREATE DIRECTORY FOR DOCKER CONFIG [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${HOME}" mkdir -p /tmp/.docker chmod a+rwx /tmp/.docker SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 14400 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: PUSH THE WILDFLY IMAGES ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: PUSH THE WILDFLY IMAGES [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/sti-wildfly" sudo chmod a+rw /tmp/.docker/config.json export DOCKER_CONFIG=/tmp/.docker
docker tag openshift/wildfly-81-centos7 docker.io/openshift/wildfly-81-centos7 docker push docker.io/openshift/wildfly-81-centos7
docker tag openshift/wildfly-90-centos7 docker.io/openshift/wildfly-90-centos7 docker push docker.io/openshift/wildfly-90-centos7
docker tag openshift/wildfly-100-centos7 docker.io/openshift/wildfly-100-centos7 docker push docker.io/openshift/wildfly-100-centos7
docker tag openshift/wildfly-101-centos7 docker.io/openshift/wildfly-101-centos7 docker push docker.io/openshift/wildfly-101-centos7
docker tag openshift/wildfly-110-centos7 docker.io/openshift/wildfly-110-centos7 docker push docker.io/openshift/wildfly-110-centos7 SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 7200 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace if [[ -z "${PULL_REFS:-}" ]]; then test_pull_requests --merge_pull_request "${STI_WILDFLY_PULL_ID}" --repo sti-wildfly --config ~/test_pull_requests/sti-wildfly.json fi
